about_the_game:
Battle Royale: For Your Heart! (BRFYH) is a battle royale themed romance parody game in development. This game is a critique on common visual novel and anime tropes, online gaming communities, and, of course, the ever-growing popularity of battle royale games.


After watching SamuraiStriker, world famous streamer and competitive battle royale player, invite gamers of all skill levels to join him in LegendEx Games' Fighter's Cup, you decide to enter the tournament to try and win the highly sought after mystery prize.
The only problem? You are a complete noob, mistakenly entered the duos tournament as a solo player, have to scramble to find a partner, and attempt to win the competition!


Select your avatar, player voice, gamertag, and possible duo partner, as you venture into an expansive virtual world alongside a colorful cast of characters.
It is up to you to decide how the game unfolds. Unlock hidden scenes, build a bond with your partner (or enemies!) and try to win the competition!


Features:

  • 4 romance routes.
  • Choose your avatar, their voice, and their gamertag.
  • Selectable avatar with voice options.
  • Interactive Map, Mini-Map, and Friends List.
  • Ability to choose weapons and more.
  • Partial voice acting.
  • A story that changes based on your decisions!


The Newest Demo Includes:

  • Selectable protagonist, voice, gamertag.
  • 2-3 hours of gameplay.
  • Restructured script with a new character to meet and team up with!
  • Exploration of the lobby and the swamp.
  • Partial voice acting (with some new voice lines).
  • A variety of dialogue choices.
  • 4 original compositions.
  • Custom sprite art, backgrounds, UI, and CG.


Date a diverse cast of characters with interesting backstories and attractive designs.


Player Characters: Choose your player's appearance, voice, and gamertag. You're a new player on the battle royale scene and don't know much about the game or virtual world. Navigate the routes in order to learn about the game mechanics, your partner, and the world around you.



Midnight: Midnight is a seasoned battle veteran in LegendEx Games competitions. He's not quick to remind you that he played during the game's beta, but everyone else is. But can you blame them for being impressed with the charismatic wolf man? This amicable tactician is a strategic opponent and an even more calculating teammate. Will you choose to pair up with the experienced battle royaler or face him on the battlefield?


TwinTails: TwinTails is a peppy, vibrant girl who lights up the room… until you do something she doesn’t like. Her happy-go-lucky persona drops and is replaced with a fiery temper. Still, one can’t help but be enchanted by her... Will you choose to romance her, ally with her, or become enemies?


SamuraiStriker: Striker is a famous streamer and possible love interest. He started as a competitive player in esports but has long since watered down his content for his younger audience. Striker has a dual persona. On stream, he plays the part of a hero, trying to garner more attention and views. Off camera, he’s a little bit different. Which side will he show you?


HollyDay: Holly is a no-nonsense kind of woman. She’s focused on winning the battle royale and won’t let anything stop her, even her partner. Being hyper focused on the win leaves others thinking she has a chilly personality, but in reality, that may not be the case. Which side will you get to know?

Rex: Once Striker's best friend and duo partner, this scorned online personality is out for revenge and you may just be in the way, or the only one who can stop him!
